analyzed: viññāṇam visesa paccayaḥ na hi okkanta viññāṇa abhāve nāma rūpassa atthi sambhavaḥ yathā āha

original: samuccissathā”tiādi. Vuttamevatthaṃ suttena sādhetuṃ “yathāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: samuccissatha atiādi vuttam eva attham suttena sādhetum yathā āha atiādi vuttam

original: Evaṃ yadipi paccayattho āhārattho, visesapaccayattā pana imeva āhārāti vuttāti taṃ

original: Sabbathāpīti cakkhusamphassādivasena. Yattakā phassassa pakārabhedā, tesaṃ vasena

original: Sabbathāpīti idhāpi phassāhāre vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo. Tisantativasenāti

original: panassa upathambhanakiccasiddhi. Phusantoyevāti phusanakiccaṃ karonto eva. Āyūhamānāvāti

original: Upādiṇṇarūpasantatiyā upatthambhaneneva utucittajarūpasantatīnampi upatthambhanasiddhi

original: Na hi dhammānaṃ sabhāvena vinā pavatti atthi, vedanāpavattiyā vinā sattānaṃ sandhāvanatā

analyzed: paṭisandhim ādim katvā ti paṭisandhi khaṇam ādim katvā upādiṇṇaka āhāre sandhāya atta bhāva saṅkhātānam

original: Ūnaūnasantativasenāti cakkhunā, sotena, tadubhayena, bhāvena ca ūnaūnasantativasena.

original: Paṭisandhiyaṃ jātā paṭisandhikā. Paṭhamabhavaṅgacittakkhaṇādīti ādi-saddena tadārammaṇacittassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

analyzed: nayataḥ ca sakalam eva vaṭṭam dassetvā idāni tam attham vitthārataḥ vibhāvetum imasmin ca

original: atītadhammābhimukhaṃ tabbisayaṃ desanaṃ katvā tathākāraṇena. Atītena vaṭṭaṃ dassetīti
analyzed: atīta dhamma abhimukham tad visayam desanam katvā tathā kāraṇena atītena vaṭṭam dasseti iti

original: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “atītena vaṭṭaṃ dassetī”ti vuttanti? Nāyaṃ doso “atītenevā”ti anavadhāraṇato,

original: Na hi kammunā vinā taṇhā bhavanetti yujjati.
analyzed: na hi kammunā vinā taṇhā yujjati

original: kammasseva gahaṇaṃ. Dvīsu ṭhānesūti āhāraggahaṇena vedanādiggahaṇenāti dvīsu ṭhānesu.

original: Attabhāvoti paccuppannakāliko atītakāliko ca attabhāvo. Puna dvīsūti taṇhāggahaṇe

original: avijjāsaṅkhāraggahaṇeti dvīsu ṭhānesu. Tassa janakanti paccuppannassa ceva atītassa

original: ca attabhāvassa janakaṃ kammaṃ vuttanti yojanā. Kammaggahaṇena cettha yattha taṃ

original: Yadi atītena vaṭṭaṃ dassitaṃ, evaṃ sati sappadesā paṭiccasamuppādadhammadesanā hotīti

12. Imasmiṃyeva ṭhāneti “cattārome bhikkhu…pe… āhārā”ti evaṃ cattāro āhāre sarūpato

analyzed: sayam ca akampayam puggalam ca adhibalam karoti iti āha akampana ṭṭhena

original: upatthambhanaṭṭhena cā”ti.
analyzed: upatthambhana ṭṭhena ca ati

original: Ṭhānañca ṭhānatoti kāraṇañca kāraṇato. Kāraṇañhi yasmā phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttitāya

original: uppajjati ceva pavattati ca, tasmā “ṭhāna”nti vuccati. Vipariyāyena aṭṭhānanti akāraṇaṃ
analyzed: uppajjati ca iva pavattati ca tasmā ṭhānanti vuccati vipariyāyena aṭṭhānanti akāraṇam

original: veditabbaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ bhagavā yena ñāṇena ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ hetū
analyzed: veditabbam tat ubhayam bhagavā yena ñāṇena ye ye dhammāḥ yesam yesam dhammānam hetū

original: uppādāya, taṃ taṃ aṭṭhānanti pajānāti. Taṃ sandhāyāha “ṭhānañca…pe… jānanaṃ eka”nti.
analyzed: uppādāya tam tam aṭṭhānanti pajānāti tam sandhāya āha jānanam ekam ti

original: Kammasamādānānanti kammaṃ samādiyitvā katānaṃ kusalākusalakammānaṃ, kammaññeva vā

original: kammasamādānaṃ. Ṭhānaso hetusoti paccayato ca hetuto ca. Tattha gatiupadhikālapayogā

original: vipākassa ṭhānaṃ, kammaṃ hetu. Sabbatthagāminīpaṭipadājānananti sabbagatigāminiyā

original: agatigāminiyā ca paṭipadāya maggassa jānanaṃ, bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ hanantesu
analyzed: agati gāminiyā ca paṭipadāya maggassa jānanam bahūsu pi manussesu ekam eva pāṇam hanantesu

original: “imassa cetanā nirayagāminī bhavissati, imassa tiracchānayonigāminī”ti iminā nayena
analyzed: imassa cetanā niraya gāminī bhavissati imassa tiracchāna yoni gāminī iti iminā nayena

original: ekavatthusmimpi kusalākusalacetanāsaṅkhātānaṃ paṭipattīnaṃ aviparītato sabhāvajānanaṃ.

original: Anekadhātunānādhātulokajānananti cakkhudhātuādīhi kāmadhātuādīhi vā bahudhātuno,
analyzed: cakkhu dhātu ādīhi kāmadhātu ādīhi vā bahu dhātuno

original: tāsaṃyeva dhātūnaṃ viparītatāya nānappakāradhātuno khandhāyatanadhātulokassa jānanaṃ.

original: Parasattānanti paresaṃ sattānaṃ. Nānādhimuttikatājānananti hīnādīhi adhimuttīhi nānādhimuttikabhāvassa
analyzed: para sattānam nti paresam sattānam nānā adhimuttika tā jānanam ti hīna ādīhi adhimuttīhi nānā adhimuttika bhāvassa

original: paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ, “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ,
analyzed: paṭhama ādīnam catunnam jhānānam rūpī rūpāni passati itiādīnam aṭṭhannam vimokkhānam

original: anupubbasamāpattīnaṃ. Saṃkilesavodānavuṭṭhānajānananti hānabhāgiyassa, visesabhāgiyassa

analyzed: vodānam pi vuṭṭhānam tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānam pi vuṭṭhānam ti evam vutta paguṇa jhānassa

original: jānanaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
analyzed: jānanam ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ vitthāraḥ pana visuddhi magge vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ

original: Āsavakkhayajānanaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ, maggañāṇanti attho. Yattha panetāni vitthārato

original: āgatāni saṃvaṇṇitāni, tāni dassento “abhidhamme panā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: āgatāni saṃvaṇṇitāni tāni dassentaḥ abhidhamme pana ati ādim āha

original: Byāmohabhayavasena saraṇapariyesanaṃ sārajjanaṃ sārado, byāmohabhayaṃ. Vigato sārado
analyzed: byāmoha bhaya vasena saraṇa pariyesanam sārajjanam sāradaḥ vyāmoha bhayam vigataḥ sāradaḥ

analyzed: khemam nissāya pavattam catubbidham paccavekkhaṇa āñāṇam tena āha catūsu ṭhānesu itiādi

original: Catūsūti paraparikappitesu vatthūsu. Paraparikappitesu vā vatthumattesu codanākāraṇesu.
analyzed: catūsu iti para parikappitesu vatthūsu para parikappitesu vā vatthu mattesu codanā kāraṇesu

original: Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānatoti “ahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti evaṃ paṭijānantena tayā.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ti aham sammāsambuddhaḥ iti evam paṭijānantena tayā

original: Ime dhammāti “idaṃ pañcamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, ayaṃ chaṭṭho upādānakkhandho, idaṃ terasamaṃ
analyzed: ime dhammā ti idam pañcamam ariya saccam ayam chaṭṭhaḥ upādāna kkhandho idam terasamam

original: āyatana”nti veditabbā ime dhammā. Anabhisambuddhā appaṭividdhattāti.
analyzed: āyatanam ti veditabbāḥ ime dhammāḥ an abhisambuddhāḥ appaṭividdha ttā ti

original: Tatrāti tasmiṃ anabhisambuddhadhammasaṅkhāte codanāvatthusmiṃ. Kocīti samaṇādīhi
analyzed: tatra ati tasmin anabhisambuddha dhamma saṅkhāte codanā vatthusmim koci iti samaṇa ādīhi

original: añño vā yo koci. Saha dhammenāti saha hetunā. “Dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viya hetupariyāyo
analyzed: aññaḥ vā yaḥ koci saha dhammena ati saha hetunā dhamma paṭisambhidā ti ādīsu viya hetu pariyāyaḥ

original: idha dhamma-saddo. Hetūti ca uppattisādhanahetu veditabbo, na kārako sampāpako vā.
analyzed: idha dhamma saddaḥ hetu uti ca uppatti sādhana hetu veditabbaḥ na kārakaḥ sampāpakaḥ vā

original: Nimittanti kāraṇaṃ, taṃ panettha codanāvatthumeva. Na samanupassāmi sammāsambuddhabhāvato.
analyzed: nimittam ti kāraṇam tam pana ittha codanā vatthum eva na samanupassāmi sammāsambuddha bhāvato

original: Khemappattoti akhemappattarūpāya codanāya anupaddavaṃ patto niccalabhāvappatto. Vesārajjappattoti
analyzed: khemappatto ti a khemappatta rūpāya codanāya anupaddavam pattaḥ niccala bhāva pattaḥ vesārajja ppattaḥ ti

original: visāradabhāvappatto. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – ime āsavāti kāmāsavādīsu
analyzed: visārada bhāva patto sesesu pi esā iva nayaḥ ayam pana visesaḥ ime kāma āsava ādīsu

analyzed: ime nāma āsavā na parikkhīṇā ti āsava kkhaya vacanena ittha sabba kilesa ppahānam vuttam

original: Na hi so kileso atthi, yo sabbaso āsavesu khīṇesu nappahīyeyya. Antarāyikāti antarāyakarā,
analyzed: na hi so kilesaḥ atthi yaḥ sabbaso āsavesu khīṇesu na ppahīyeyya antarāyikā ati antarāya karā

original: saggavimokkhādhigamassa antarāyakarāti attho. Dhammo hi yo saṃkilesato niyyāti, so

analyzed: niyyāniko ti vuttaḥ dhamme niyyante tad samaṅgī puggalo niyyāniko ti voharito hoti iti

original: tassa paṭikkhipanto “so na niyyātī”ti āha. Kathaṃ pana desanādhammo niyyātīti vuccati?
analyzed: tassa paṭikkhipantaḥ so na niyyāti iti āha katham pana desanā dhammo niyyāti iti vuccati

original: Niyyānatthasamādhānato, so abhedopacārena “niyyātī”ti vutto. Atha vā “dhammo desito”ti

original: ariyadhammassa adhippetattā na koci virodho.
analyzed: ariya dhammassa adhippetattā na koci virodho

original: Usabhassa idanti āsabhaṃ, asantasanaṭṭhena āsabhaṃ viyāti āsabhaṃ, seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ

analyzed: abhimukham gacchanti catassaḥ vā parisāḥ upasaṅkamanti iti āsabhā catassaḥ api hi parisā

original: buddhābhimukhā evaṃ tiṭṭhanti, na tiṭṭhanti parammukhā. Idampīti “usabho”ti idampi

analyzed: icchitam tatas eva tesam vasena āsabhaṇṭhānam hoti iti daṭṭhabbam yam

original: kiñci loke upamaṃ nāma buddhaguṇānaṃ nidassanabhāvena vuccati, sabbaṃ taṃ nihīnameva.

original: Tiṭṭhamāno cāti atiṭṭhantopi tiṭṭhamāno eva paṭijānāti nāma. Upagacchatīti anujānāti.
analyzed: tiṭṭhamānaḥ ca ati a tiṭṭhantaḥ api tiṭṭhamānaḥ eva paṭijānāti nāma upagacchati iti anujānāti

original: Aṭṭha kho imāti idaṃ vesārajjañāṇassa baladassanaṃ. Yathā hi byattaṃ parisaṃ ajjhogāhetvā
analyzed: aṭṭha kho imā ti idam vesārajja ñāṇassa bala dassanam yathā hi byattam parisam ajjhogāhetvā

original: viññūnaṃ cittaṃ ārādhanasamatthāya kathāya dhammakathikassa chekabhāvo paññāyati,
analyzed: viññūnam cittam ārādhana samatthāya kathāya dhamma kathikassa cheka bhāvaḥ paññāyati

original: “parisāsū”ti. Khattiyaparisāti khattiyānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ samūho. Esa nayo sabbattha.
analyzed: parisāsu iti khattiya parisā ati khattiyānam sannipatitānam samūhaḥ esa nayaḥ sabbattha

original: Māraparisāti mārakāyikānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ samūho. Mārasadisānaṃ mārānaṃ parisāti

original: māraparisā. Sabbā cetā parisā uggaṭṭhānadassanavasena gahitā. Manussā hi “ettha rājā
analyzed: māra parisā sabbā cetā parisā uggaṭṭhāna dassana vasena gahitā manussā hi ettha rājā

original: nisinno”ti vutte pakativacanampi vattuṃ na sakkonti, kacchehi sedā muccanti, evaṃ
analyzed: nisinnaḥ iti vutte pakativacanam pi vattum na sakkonti kacchehi sedāḥ muccanti evam

original: uggā khattiyaparisā, brāhmaṇā tīsu vedesu kusalā honti, gahapatayo nānāvohāresu ca
analyzed: uggāḥ khattiya parisāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ tīsu vedesu kusalāḥ honti gahapatayaḥ nānā vohāresu ca

original: akkharacintāya ca kusalā, samaṇā sakavādaparavādesu kusalā, tesaṃ majjhe dhammakathākathanaṃ
analyzed: akkhara cintāya ca kusalā samaṇā saka vāda para vādesu kusalā tesam majjhe dhamma kathā kathanam

original: nāma ativiya bhāriyaṃ. Devānaṃ uggabhāve vattabbameva natthi. Amanussoti hi vuttamatte
analyzed: nāma ativiya bhāriyam devānam ugga bhāve vattabbam eva na atthi amanussaḥ ti hi vutta matte

original: manussānaṃ sakalasarīraṃ kampati, tesaṃ rūpaṃ disvāpi saddaṃ sutvāpi sattā visaññitāpi
analyzed: manussānam sakala sarīram kampati tesam rūpam disvā api saddam sutvā api sattā visaññitā api

original: honti. Evaṃ amanussaparisā uggā. Iti cetā parisā uggaṭṭhānadassanavasena vuttā. Kasmā
analyzed: honti evam amanussa parisāḥ uggāḥ iti ca itā parisā ugga ṭṭhāna dassana vasena vuttā kasmā

original: panettha yāmādiparisā na gahitāti? Bhusaṃ kāmābhigiddhatāya yonisomanasikāravirahato.
analyzed: pana ittha yāma ādi parisā na gahitā ati bhusam kāma abhigiddha tāya yoni soma nasikāra virahato

original: Yāmādayo hi uḷāruḷāre kāme paṭisevantā tatthābhigiddhatāya dhammassavanāya sabhāvena
analyzed: yāma ādayaḥ hi uḷāra uḷāre kāme paṭisevantā tattha abhigiddha tāya dhamma ssavanāya sabhāvena

original: cittampi na uppādenti, mahābodhisattānaṃ pana buddhānañca ānubhāvena ākaḍḍhiyamānā
analyzed: cittam pi na uppādenti mahā bodhisattānam pana buddhānam ca ānubhāvena ākaḍḍhiyamānā

original: kadāci nesaṃ payirupāsanādīni karonti tādise mahāsamaye. Teneva hi vimānavatthudesanāpi
analyzed: kadācid karonti tādise mahā samaye tena iva hi vimāna vatthu desanā api

original: taṃnimittā bahulā nāhosi. Seṭṭhanādanti kenaci appaṭihatabhāvena uttamanādaṃ. Abhītanādanti
analyzed: taṃnimittā bahulā seṭṭha nādanti kenaci a paṭihata bhāvena uttama nādam abhīta nādanti

original: vesārajjayogato kutoci nibbhayanādaṃ. Sīhanādasuttenāti khandhiyavagge āgatena sīhanādasuttena.
analyzed: vesā rajja yogataḥ kutoci nibbhaya nādam sīhanāda suttena ati khandhiya vagge āgatena sīhanāda suttena

original: Sahanatoti khamanato. Hananatoti vidhamanato viddhaṃsanato. Yathā vātiādi “sīhanādasadisaṃ
analyzed: sahanataḥ uti khamanataḥ hananataḥ uti vidhamanataḥ viddhaṃsanataḥ yathā vātiādi sīha nāda sadisam

original: vā nādaṃ nadatī”ti saṅkhepato vuttassa atthassa viññāpanaṃ.
analyzed: vā nādam nadati iti saṅkhepataḥ vuttassa atthassa viññāpanam

original: Etanti “brahmacakka”nti etaṃ padaṃ. Paññāpabhāvitanti cirakālaparibhāvitāya pāramitāpaññāya
analyzed: etan ti etam padam paññā apabhāvitanti cira kāla paribhāvitāya pāramitā paññāya

original: vipassanāpaññāya ca uppāditaṃ. Karuṇāpabhāvitanti “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinayappavattāya
analyzed: vipassanā paññāya ca uppāditam karuṇā pabhāvitanti kiccham vata ayam lokaḥ āpannaḥ ti ādi naya ppavattāya

analyzed: upanisa sutta vaṇṇanā

original: Ugghāṭitāti vivaṭā, vūpasamitāti attho. Tatthāti arahattappattiyaṃ. Vicikicchābhāvanti nibbematikataṃ.

original: Na evaṃ byākatāti “khīṇā jātī”tiādikā evaṃ uttānakaṃ na byākatā, pariyāyena pana byākatā. Kenacīti kenacipi kāraṇena. Evaṃ uttānakaṃ byākarissati.

original: Meti mayā. Aññāsi ākāraggahaṇena cittācāraṃ jānāti. Tenāti bhagavatā. Byākaraṇaṃ anumoditaṃ pañhabyākaraṇassa visayakatabhāvato.

original: vuccatīti āha “garuvacanameta”nti. Atidūraṃ accāsannaṃ atisammukhā atipacchato uparivāto
analyzed: vuccati iti āha garu vacanam etat ti atidūram acca āsannam ati sammukhāḥ ati pacchatas uparivāto

original: unnatappadesoti ime cha nisajjadosā. Nīlapītalohitodātamañjiṭṭhapabhassaravasena chabbaṇṇānaṃ.
analyzed: unnata ppadesaḥ ti ime cha nisajja dosāḥ nīla pīta lohita udāta mañjiṭṭha pabhassara vasena chabbaṇṇānam

original: Kulasaṅgahatthāyāti kulānuddayatāvasena kulānuggaṇhanatthāya. Sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ nikkhipanto
analyzed: kula saṅga hatthāya ati kula an uddaya tā vasena kula an uggaṇhana tthāya sahassa bhaṇḍikam nikkhipantaḥ

original: viya bhikkhāpaṭiggaṇhanena tesaṃ abhivādanādisampaṭicchanena ca puññābhisandassa
analyzed: viya bhikkhā paṭiggaṇhanena tesam abhivādana ādi sampaṭicchanena ca puñña abhisandassa

original: jananena. Paṭisammajjitvāti antevāsikehi sammaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ sakkaccakāritāya puna sammajjitvā.
analyzed: jananena paṭisammajjitvā ati antevāsikehi sammaṭṭha ṭṭhānam sakkacca kāritāya puna sammajjitvā

original: Ubhayantato paṭṭhāya majjhanti ādito paṭṭhāya vedanaṃ, jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya ca vedanaṃ

original: pāpetvā sammasanamāha. Tikkhattunti “ādito paṭṭhāya anta”ntiādinā vuttacaturākārupasaṃhite
analyzed: pāpetvā sammasanam āha tikkhattum ti āditaḥ paṭṭhāya anta nti ādinā vutta catur ākāra upasaṃhite

original: tayo vāre. Tena dvādasakkhattuṃ sammasanamāha. Amhākaṃ bhagavatā gambhīrabhāveneva
analyzed: tayaḥ vāre tena dvādasa kkhattum sammasanam āha amhākam bhagavatā gambhīra bhāvena iva

analyzed: kathita ttā sesa buddhehi pi evam eva kathitoti dhamma nvaye ṭhatvā vuttam kathitoti

original: Pamāṇātikkameti aparimāṇatthe “yāvañcidaṃ tena bhagavatā”tiādīsu viya. Atirekabhāvajotano

original: hi yaṃ yāva-saddo. Tenāha “atigambhīroti attho”ti. Avabhāsati khāyati upaṭṭhāti ñāṇassa.
analyzed: hi yam yāva saddaḥ tena āha ati gambhīraḥ iti atthaḥ ti avabhāsati khāyati upaṭṭhāti ñāṇassa

original: Tathā upaṭṭhānañhi sandhāya “dissatī”ti vuttaṃ. Nanu esa paṭiccasamuppādo ekantagambhīrova,
analyzed: tathā upaṭṭhānam hi sandhāya dissati iti vuttam nanu esa paṭiccasamuppādaḥ ekanta gambhīraḥ va

original: nidassetvā tamevassa ekantagambhīrataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “ekaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Etaṃ natthīti
analyzed: nidassetvā tam eva assa ekanta gambhīra tam vibhāvetum ekam hi itiādi vuttam etam na atthi iti

original: agambhīro agambhīrāvabhāso cāti etaṃ dvayaṃ natthi. Tena yathādassite cātukoṭike
analyzed: agambhīro agambhīra avabhāso ca ati etam dvayam na atthi tena yathā dassite cātukoṭike

original: pacchimā ekakoṭi labbhatīti dasseti. Tenāha “ayaṃ hī”tiādi.
analyzed: pacchimā eka koṭi labbhati iti dasseti tena āha ayam hi itiādi

original: Yehi gambhīrabhāvehi paṭiccasamuppādo “gambhīro”ti vuccati, te catūhi upamāhi ulliṅgento

original: “bhavaggaggahaṇāyā”tiādimāha. Yathā bhavaggaggahaṇatthaṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvā gahetuṃ
analyzed: bha vagga ggahaṇāya iti ādim āha yathā bha vagga ggahaṇa attham hattham pasāretvā gahetum

original: gahetuṃ na sakkā. Yathā sineruṃ bhinditvā miñjaṃ pabbatarasaṃ pākatikapurisena nīharituṃ

original: paṭivijjhanavasena jānituṃ na sakkā. Yathā mahāsamuddaṃ pakatipurisassa bāhudvayavasena

analyzed: pāram taritum na sakkā evam vepulla ṭṭhena mahā samudda sadisam paṭiccasamuppādam pakati ñāṇena

original: desanāvasena pariharituṃ na sakkā. Yathā pathaviṃ parivattetvā pākatikapurisassa
analyzed: desanā vasena pariharitum na sakkā yathā pathavim parivattetvā pākatika purisassa

original: pathavojaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ itthaṃ avijjādayo saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayā hontīti

analyzed: catasso upamā yojetabbā pākatika ñāṇa vasena ca ayam attha yojanā katā diṭṭha saccānam

analyzed: ñāṇam buddhānam yeva nippadesam tasmā vuttam buddha visayam pañhanti

original: Māti paṭisedhe nipāto. Svāyaṃ “uttānakuttānako viya khāyatī”ti vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttoti
analyzed: paṭisedhe nipāto svāyam uttānaka uttānakaḥ viya khāyati iti vacanam sandhāya vuttaḥ ti

original: āha “mā bhaṇīti attho”ti. Ussādentoti paññāvasena ukkaṃsantoti attho. Apasādentoti

analyzed: tattha ati therassa sati pi uttāna bhāve paṭiccasamuppādassa aññesam gambhīra bhāve su bhojana rasa puṭṭhassa ati

analyzed: sundarena bhojana rasena positassa kata yogassa ati nibbuddha payoge kata paricayassa

original: Mallapāsāṇanti mallehi mahābaleheva khipitabbapāsāṇaṃ. Kuhiṃ imassa bhāriyaṭṭhānanti

analyzed: piṭṭhi pattam kāya upapannassa ati mahatā kāyena upetassa mahākāyassa ati

analyzed: dve sāṭake nivāsetvā ati sāṭaka dvayam eva attano kāya parihāriyam katvā itaram sabba sambhāram attanā mocetvā

original: Tattha navahākārehīti navahi paccayabhāvūpagamanehi ākārehi. Uppajjati etasmā phalanti

original: uppādo, phaluppattiyā kāraṇabhāvo. Sati ca avijjāya saṅkhārā uppajjanti, nāsati,
analyzed: uppādaḥ phala uppattiyā kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sati ca avijjāya saṅkhārāḥ uppajjanti na asati

original: tasmā avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ uppādo hoti. Tathā avijjāya sati saṅkhārā pavattanti ca
analyzed: tasmai avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ uppādaḥ hoti tathā avijjāya sati saṅkhārāḥ pavattanti ca

original: uppannā, taṃ palibundhanti paccayantarasamavāye udayanti uppajjanti, hinoti ca saṅkhārānaṃ

original: etenāti ṭhiti, kāraṇaṃ. Uppādo eva ṭhiti uppādaṭhiti. Esa nayo sesesupi. Idañca paccayākāradassanaṃ
analyzed: etena ati ṭhiti kāraṇam uppādaḥ eva ṭhiti uppāda ṭhiti esa nayo sesesu pi idam ca paccaya ākāra dassanam

original: Etassa dhammassāti etassa paṭiccasamuppādasaññitassa dhammassa. So pana yasmā atthato

original: 1. Assutavāsuttavaṇṇanā
61. “Assutavā”ti sotadvārānusārena upadhāritaṃ, upadhāraṇaṃ vā sutaṃ assa atthīti
analyzed: assutavā ati sotadvāra anusārena upadhāritam upadhāraṇam vā sutam assa atthi iti

original: sutavā, tappaṭikkhepena na sutavāti assutavā. Vā-saddo cāyaṃ pasaṃsāyaṃ, atisayassa
analyzed: sutavā tad paṭikkhepena na sutavā ati assutavā vā saddo ca ayam atisayassa

original: vā bodhanako, tasmā yassa pasaṃsitaṃ, atisayena vā sutaṃ atthi, so “sutavā”ti saṃkilesaviddhaṃsanasamattho

original: pariyattidhammaparicayo “taṃ sutvā tathattāya paṭipatti ca sutavā”ti iminā padena
analyzed: pariyatti dhamma paricayaḥ tam sutvā tathattāya paṭipatti ca iminā padena

original: pakāsito. Atha vā sotabbayuttaṃ sutvā kattabbanipphattiṃ suṇīti sutavā. Tappaṭikkhepena
analyzed: pakāsito atha vā sotabba yuttam sutvā kattabba nipphattim suṇīti sutavā tad paṭikkhepena

original: na sutavāti assutavā. Tenāhu porāṇā “āgamādhigamābhāvā, ñeyyo assutavā itī”ti. Tathā
analyzed: na sutavā ati assutavā tena āhu porāṇāḥ āgama adhigama abhāvāḥ ñeyyaḥ assutavā iti iti tathā

original: cāha “khandhadhātu…pe… vinicchayarahito”ti. Tattha vācuggatakaraṇaṃ uggaho, tattha
analyzed: ca āha khandha dhātupe vinicchaya rahitaḥ ti tattha uggaho tattha

original: paripucchanaṃ paripucchā, kusalehi saha codanāpariharaṇavasena vinicchayassa kāraṇaṃ
analyzed: paripucchanam paripucchā kusalehi saha codanā pariharaṇa vasena vinicchayassa kāraṇam

original: vinicchayo. Puthūnanti bahūnaṃ. Kilesādīnaṃ kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ paṭisambhidāmagganiddesesu
analyzed: vinicchayaḥ puthūnam ti bahūnam kilesa ādīnam kilesa abhisaṅkhārānam vitthāretabbam paṭisambhidā magga niddesesu

original: āgatanayena. Andhaputhujjano gahito “nālaṃ nibbinditu”ntiādivacanato. Āsannapaccakkhavācī
analyzed: āgata nayena andha puthujjanaḥ gahitaḥ na alam nibbinditum ti ādi vacanataḥ āsanna paccakkha vācī

original: idaṃ-saddoti āha “imasminti paccuppannapaccakkhakāyaṃ dassetī”ti. Catūsu mahābhūtesu
analyzed: idam saddo ti āha imasmin ti paccuppanna paccakkha kāyam dasseti iti catūsu mahābhūtesu

original: niyuttoti cātumahābhūtiko. Yathā pana mahāmattikāya nibbattaṃ mattikāmayaṃ, evamayaṃ
analyzed: niyuttaḥ iti cātumahābhūtikaḥ yathā pana mahā mattikāya nibbattam mattikā mayam eva mayam

original: catūhi mahābhūtehi nibbatto “catumahābhūtamayo”ti vuttaṃ. Nibbindeyyāti nibbindanampi
analyzed: catūhi mahābhūtehi nibbattaḥ catu mahābhūta mayaḥ ti vuttam nibbindeyya ati nibbindanam pi

original: āpajjeyya. Nibbindanā nāma ukkaṇṭhanā anabhiratibhāvatoti vuttaṃ “ukkaṇṭheyyā”ti.
analyzed: āpajjeyya nibbindanā nāma ukkaṇṭhanā an abhirati bhāvato ti vuttam ukkaṇṭheyya ati

original: Virajjeyyāti vītarāgo bhaveyya. Tenāha “na rajjeyyā”ti. Vimucceyyāti idha pana accantāya
analyzed: virajjeyya ati vīta rāgaḥ bhaveyya tena āha na rajjeyya ati vimucceyya ati idha pana accantāya

original: vimuccanaṃ adhippetanti āha “muccitukāmo bhaveyyā”ti. Catūhi ca rūpajanakapaccayehi
analyzed: vimuccanam adhippetanti āha muccitu kāmaḥ bhaveyya iti catūhi ca rūpa janaka paccayehi

original: āgato cayoti, ācayo, vuddhi. Cayato apakkamoti apacayo, parihāni. Ādānanti gahaṇaṃ,
analyzed: āgataḥ cayo ti ācayaḥ cayataḥ apakkamo apacayo gahaṇaṃ

original: paṭisandhiyā nibbatti. Bhedoti khandhānaṃ bhedo. So hi kaḷevarassa nikkhepoti vuttoti
analyzed: paṭisandhiyā nibbatti bhedaḥ ti khandhānam bhedaḥ saḥ hi kaḷevarassa nikkhepaḥ ti vutto ti

original: āha “nikkhepananti bhedo”ti.
analyzed: āha nikkhepananti bhedo ti

original: Paññāyantīti pakārato ñāyanti. Rūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ pariggaṇhanavasenapi rūpaṃ ālambituṃ.
analyzed: paññāyanti iti pakārataḥ ñāyanti rūpam pariggahetum pariggaṇhana vasena api rūpam ālambitum

original: Ayuttarūpaṃ katvā taṇhādīhi pariggahetuṃ arūpaṃ pariggaṇhituṃ yuttarūpaṃ karoti tesaṃ
analyzed: ayutta rūpam katvā taṇhā ādīhi pariggahetum arūpam pariggaṇhitum yutta rūpam karoti tesam

analyzed: bhikkhūnam sappāya bhāvato tena āha kasmā itiādi nikkaḍḍhanto ti tatas gāhataḥ nīharanto

original: Manāyatanasseva nāmaṃ, na samādhipaññattīnaṃ “cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ, citto gahapatī”tiādīsu
analyzed: nāmam na samādhi paññattīnam cittam paññam ca bhāvayan cittaḥ gahapati iti ādīsu

original: viya. Cittīkātabbabhūtaṃ vatthu etassāti cittavatthu, tassa bhāvo cittavatthutā,
analyzed: viya cittīkātabba bhūtam vatthu etassa ati citta vatthu tassa bhāvaḥ citta vatthu tā

original: tena kāraṇena cittabhāvamāha. Cittagocaratāyāti cittavicittavisayatāya. Sampayuttadhammacittatāyāti
analyzed: tena kāraṇena citta bhāvam āha citta gocara tāya ati citta vicitta visaya tāya sampayutta dhamma citta tāya ati

original: rāgādisaddhādisampayuttadhammavasena cittasabhāvattā. Tena cittatāya cittattamāha.

original: Vijānanaṭṭhenāti bujjhanaṭṭhena. Ajjhositanti ajjhosābhūtāya taṇhāya gahitaṃ. Tenāha

original: ekanteneva paripūretabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ. Cittuppādamattampi saṃkilesamalaṃ
analyzed: ekantena iva paripūretabba tāya ekanta paripuṇṇam citta uppāda mattam pi saṃkilesa malam

original: anuppādetvā accantameva visuddhaṃ katvā pariharitabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ. Tato
analyzed: an uppādetvā accantam eva visuddham katvā pariharitabba tāya ekanta parisuddham tatas

original: eva saṅkhaṃ viya likhitanti saṅkhalikhitaṃ. Tenāha “likhitasaṅkhasadisa”nti. Dāṭhikāpi
analyzed: eva saṅkham saṅkha likhitam tena āha dāṭhikā api

original: taggahaṇeneva gahetvā “massu”tveva vuttaṃ, na ettha kevalaṃ massuyevāti attho. Kasāyena rattāni kāsāyāni.

original: Vaṅgasāṭakoti vaṅgadese uppannasāṭako. Esāti mahākassapatthero. Abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya

original: paṇidhānato pabhuti, ayaṃ idāni vuccamānā. Aggasāvakadvayaṃ upādāya tatiyattā “tatiyasāvaka”nti
analyzed: paṇidhānataḥ ayam idāni vuccamānā agga sāvaka dvayam upādāya tatiya ttā tatiya sāvakanti

original: vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassanti bhikkhūnaṃ satasahassañceva saṭṭhisahassāni

original: ca aṭṭha ca sahassāni.
analyzed: ca aṭṭha ca sahassāni

original: Ayañca ayañca guṇoti sīlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggaphalā guṇoti kittento mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamāno viya kathesi.

original: Kolāhalanti devatāhi nibbattito kolāhalo.
analyzed: devatāhi nibbattitaḥ kolāhalaḥ

original: Khuddakādivasena pañcavaṇṇā. Taraṇaṃ vā hotu maraṇaṃ vāti mahoghaṃ ogāhanto puriso

original: maccherapahānassa kathitattā.
analyzed: maccheḥ apahānassa kathitattā

original: Satthu guṇā kathitā nāma hontīti vuttaṃ “satthu guṇe kathentassā”ti. Tato paṭṭhāyāti tadā satthu sammukhā dhammassavanato paṭṭhāya.
analyzed: satthu guṇā kathitāḥ nāma honti iti vuttam satthu guṇe kathentassa ati tatas paṭṭhāya ati tadā satthu sammukhā dhamma ssavanato paṭṭhāya

original: Tathāgatamañcassāti tathāgatassa paribhogamañcassa. Dānaṃ datvā brāhmaṇassa purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Tādisasseva seṭṭhino dhītā hutvā.
analyzed: tathāgata mañcassa ati tathāgatassa paribhoga mañcassa dānam da tvā brāhmaṇassa purohita ṭṭhāne ṭhapesi tādisassa iva seṭṭhinaḥ dhītā hutvā

original: Adinnavipākassāti pubbe katūpacitassa sabbaso na dinnavipākassa. Tassa kammassāti

analyzed: atta bhāve sattasu ṭhānesu duggandha sarīra tāya paṭinivatti tā iṭṭhaka pantī iti suvaṇṇiṭṭhaka panti

original: Ghaṭaniṭṭhakāyāti tassa pantiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ ṭhapitaiṭṭhakāya saddhiṃ ghaṭetabbaiṭṭhakāya
analyzed: ghaṭa niṭṭhakāya ati tassa pantiyam paṭhamam ṭhapita eṭṭhakāya saddhim ghaṭetabba eṭṭhakāya

original: tena silesasambandhena.
analyzed: tena silesa sambandhena

original: Phussarathanti maṅgalarathaṃ. Uṇhīsaṃ vālabījanī khaggo maṇipādukā setacchattanti

analyzed: puñña anubhāva coditaḥ nanu tātā thūlantiādim āha

original: Pañca caṅkamanasatānīti ettha iti-saddena ādiatthena aggisālādīni pabbajitasāruppaṭṭhānāni saṅgaṇhāti.

original: mā kathethā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: mā kathetha iti ādim āha

original: 243. Bhaṇḍakanti pattacīvaraṃ. Nisīdiyeva vattassa asikkhitattā. Tujjanatthena vācā eva sattiyoti āha “vācāsattīhī”ti.
analyzed: bhaṇḍakam ti patta cīvaram nisīdiya iva vattassa a sikkhita ttā tujjanatthena vācā eva sattiyā iti āha vācā sattīhi iti

original: Vācāya sannitodakenāti vacanasaṅkhātena samantato niccaṃ katvā upatudanato sannitudakena. Vibhattialopena so niddeso. Tenāha “vacanapatodenā”ti.
analyzed: vācāya sannitodakena ati vacana saṅkhātena samantataḥ niccam katvā upatudanataḥ sannitudakena vibhatti a lopena saḥ niddeso tena āha vacana patodena ati

original: Uccakule jāti etassāti jātimā, brahmajātiko isi. Mātaṅgoti caṇḍālo. Tatthāti kumbhakārasālāyaṃ.

original: Okāsaṃ yāci kumbhakāraṃ. Mahantaṃ disvā āha – “paṭhamataraṃ paviṭṭho pabbajito”ti.

original: Tatthevāti tassāyeva sālāya dvāraṃ nissāya dvārasamīpe. Meti mayā. Khama mayhanti

original: mayhaṃ aparādhaṃ khamassu. Teti tayā. Puna teti tava. Gaṇhi uggantuṃ appadānavasena.

original: Tenāha “nāssa uggantuṃ adāsī”ti. Pabujjhiṃsūti niddāya pabujjhiṃsu pakatiyā pabujjhanavelāya upagatattā.
analyzed: tena āha na assa uggantum adāsi iti pabujjhiṃsu iti niddāya pabujjhiṃsu pakatiyā pabujjhana velāya upagata ttā

original: Chavoti nihīno. Anantamāyoti vividhamāyo māyāvī.
